Other Elements

Standard Table

Col One Col Two Col Three
Col One Row One Col Two Row One Col Three Row One
Col One Row Two Col Two Row Two Col Three Row Two 
<table class="table">
	<thead>
		<tr>
			<th>Col One</th>
			<th>Col Two</th>
			<th>Col Three</th>
		</tr>
	</thead>
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>Col One Row One</td>
			<td>Col Two Row One</td>
			<td>Col Three Row One</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>Col One Row Two</td>
			<td>Col Two Row Two</td>
			<td>Col Three Row Two</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

Stripped Table

A class of table-striped can be added in to a standard table markup to produce a banded effect.

Col One Col Two Col Three
Col One Row One Col Two Row One Col Three Row One
Col One Row Two Col Two Row Two Col Three Row Two 
<table class="table table-striped">
	<thead>
		<tr>
			<th>Col One</th>
			<th>Col Two</th>
			<th>Col Three</th>
		</tr>
	</thead>
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>Col One Row One</td>
			<td>Col Two Row One</td>
			<td>Col Three Row One</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>Col One Row Two</td>
			<td>Col Two Row Two</td>
			<td>Col Three Row Two</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

Boxed Table

A class of table-bordered to self-contain the table within a border.

Col One Col Two Col Three
Col One Row One Col Two Row One Col Three Row One
Col One Row Two Col Two Row Two Col Three Row Two 
<table class="table table-striped table-bordered">
	<thead>
		<tr>
			<th>Col One</th>
			<th>Col Two</th>
			<th>Col Three</th>
		</tr>
	</thead>
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>Col One Row One</td>
			<td>Col Two Row One</td>
			<td>Col Three Row One</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>Col One Row Two</td>
			<td>Col Two Row Two</td>
			<td>Col Three Row Two</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

Well

A well is designed to help a short statement of text stand out on the page. The padding around the well can be modified by adding a class of well-large or well-small

This text is important so it is inside a well. 
<div class="well">
	<!-- Well Text -->
</div>

Icons

<i class="icon-facebook"></i>
<i class="icon-twitter"></i>
<i class="icon-youtube"></i>
<i class="icon-soundcloud"></i>
<i class="icon-linkedin"></i>
<i class="icon-email"></i>

Clearfix

The clearfix class can be used to clear floated elements. Use this when you wish to give put the element on it's own line without other elements floating up around it.

/* The CSS generated by the Clearfix class */
.clearfix {
    *zoom: 1;
}
.clearfix:before, .clearfix:after {
    display: table;
    content: "";
}
.clearfix:after {
    clear: both;
}

Line Break

The hr class can be used to seperate content.

/* The CSS generated by the HR tag */

<hr>

}

Sliding Banners

Slide Heading

This is the text associated with the slide

Slide Heading

This is the text associated with the slide

<div class="carousel slide" id="myCarousel">
	<div class="carousel-inner">
		<div class="item">
			<img src="">
			<div class="carousel-caption">
				<h4>Slide Heading</h4>
				<p>This is the text associated with the slide</p>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
